author: matthew_l
post: I click on the Huffington Post article and I read “A group of Italian researchers have found that the 14 foot long garment — believed by some to be the burial cloth of Jesus Christ, even though scientific research suggests that’s not the case — contains DNA from plants found all over Earth.” Great assertion to your readers with no evidence whatsoever to back it up. If that wasn’t bad enough I scrolled down, and looked at the comments..
title: News About the Shroud.  Pass It On. Well, Most of It.

author: matthew_l
post: I haven’t entered all that many comments into this blog, but I enjoyed reading this blog, and looking at all the comments. I certainly did learn plenty. I’m an ordinary high schooler who is utterly fascinated by the Turin Shroud, and this blog did not decrease that fascination it only increased it. Hope someone keeps this blog alive. Matt L..
